page.title: 08Youth entertainment
page.content: The teenagers enjoy stunt riding on the Newburn B.M.X.track. In this square there are 7 Scout and Cub groups,while for girls there are 13 Brownie packs and 9 Guide groups.This year June 23rd-30th is the 75th anniversary of guiding.Princess Margaret lit a flame in London which was then taken by helicopter to York and other cities.Mrs.Robinson,the Divisional Commissioner is spreading the flame from Denton Burn Library to each group in her division. There are several youth clubs held in local schools,community centres and church halls.Karate and Judo appeal to many boys. At home many watch T.V.and videos. There is a feeling that in the future there will be more leisure time.People of all ages will have to find more leisure activities.
